titleStmt.title: At the sign of the moon and stars in Leopard's Court in Baldwins-Gardens near Holborn, lives a gentleman, who by the benefit of a learned education in the University of Louvain, daily study and 30 years practice and travels, has arrived to a greater perfection in several arts than the common practioners in physick and astrology can justly pretend to ...

At the sign of the moon and stars in Leopard's Court in Baldwins-Gardens near Holborn, lives a gentleman, who by the benefit of a learned education in the University of Louvain, daily study and 30 years practice and travels, has arrived to a greater perfection in several arts than the common practioners in physick and astrology can justly pretend to ...

notesStmt.note: Title taken from first lines of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
